author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: THE ABSOLUTE Best Lego book
review:
Opening;

Ultimate Lego star wars is the best Lego book ever released . But you may think "oh but it doesn't come with any physical bricks" yes it doesn't but it is so comprehensive with Lego star wars leading up to summer 2017 .

The book-

Out of the 320 pages 114 overall take up characters and creatures , 30 pages for locations and 150 pages for vehicles and equipment . Every magazine , every polybag , every side build , every con exclusive and every set up to its release date is here . Every Jedi , every with ,every clone , every rebel , every pirate ,every bounty hunter , every stormtrooper and every droid . Basically it has everything . In conclusion I personally got the special edition with a case and two exclusive art prints for £8 last year from my local book shop which is an sneakily bargain from the £35 retail probably the best deal I have gotten a Lego set other than the 2018 city hospital for £47.27 from £70 .

In conclusion -

I would definitely recommend it for any Lego star wars obsesive like myself .
